name: SuperFlood HD Free
description:
The popular game Super Flood is now on iPad. The whole user interface is re-made to take advantage of the iPad high resolution screen, the game play experience is now much better.

Super flood is a very addictive puzzle game. In addation to the classic square grids board, this game supports triangle &
hexagon grids board, which is even more fun and challenging than the classic board.

The objective of the game is to flood the whole board with one color. The flood area start from the top-left corner, and progressively floods into the adjacent grids color by color. The fewer steps to flood the board, the higher score you get.

Features:
- Square grid board
- Triangle grid board
- Hexagon grid board
- Small/Medium three size of board for each type

If you enjoy the game, buy the full version for more challenges.
What's in the full version:
- Big board, more challenging
- Ads free
